channel.title: Homes on Hugo González Labrador
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Hugo González Labrador

item.title: about
item.description:
Biography

Hugo Gonzalez Labrador is a DevOps Engineer at CERN. His work involved developing the CERNBox platform and perform operations to ensure the realiability of the CERNBox and supporting services.

item.title: teaching
item.description:
I have given the following dojos at the University of Vigo:

  • Docker: Container virtualisation
  • Do you want to be a Gopher? Google’s Go programming language
